trans-unit.target: 指定動態方法之傳回類型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件；如果方法沒有傳回類型，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects specifying the types of the parameters of the dynamic method, or <see langword="null" /> if the method has no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指定動態方法之參數類型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件陣列；如果方法沒有參數，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to skip JIT visibility checks on types and members accessed by the MSIL of the dynamic method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要略過動態方法的 MSIL 所存取之類型和成員的 JIT 可見度檢查，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a dynamic method that is global to a module, specifying the method name, attributes, calling convention, return type, parameter types, module, and whether just-in-time (JIT) visibility checks should be skipped for types and members accessed by the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 建立對模組而言全域的動態方法，並指定方法名稱、屬性、呼叫慣例、傳回類型、參數類型、模組，以及是否應該略過動態方法的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 所存取之類型和成員的 Just-In-Time (JIT) 可見度檢查。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the public and internal types contained in module `m`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式以建立動態方法可存取公用和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 的所有公用及內部類型包含在模組中的成員`m`。

trans-unit.source: Skipping the JIT compiler's visibility checks allows the dynamic method to access private and protected members of all other types in the module and in all other assemblies as well.
trans-unit.target: 略過 JIT 編譯器的可見性檢查可讓動態方法存取的所有其他類型和所有其他組件中模組的 private 和 protected 成員。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when writing code to serialize objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，撰寫程式碼來將物件序列化時，這十分有用。

trans-unit.source: For backward compatibility, this constructor demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag if the following conditions are both true: `m` is a module other than the calling module, and the demand for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag has failed.
trans-unit.target: 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`m`是模組之外呼叫模組，以及需求的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標失敗。

trans-unit.source: If the demand for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> succeeds, the operation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>成功時，允許此作業。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="parameterTypes" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="T:System.Void" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameterTypes" /> 的項目為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="m" /> is a module that provides anonymous hosting for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="m" /> 是為動態方法提供匿名裝載的模組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="m" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="m" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributes" /> is a combination of flags other than <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public" /> and <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributes" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static" /> 以外的旗標組合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="callingConvention" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callingConvention" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="returnType" /> is a type for which <see cref="P:System.Type.IsByRef" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="returnType" /> 類型是 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsByRef" /> 傳回 <see langword="true" /> 的對象。

trans-unit.source: to associate the dynamic method with a module other than the calling module.
trans-unit.target: 若要將動態方法產生關聯以外呼叫模組的模組。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be a zero-length string, but it cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是零長度字串，但不可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> values that specifies the attributes of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 指定動態方法屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The only combination allowed is <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public" /> and <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static" />.
trans-unit.target: 唯一允許的組合是 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static" />。

trans-unit.source: The calling convention for the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法的的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: Must be <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that specifies the return type of the dynamic method, or <see langword="null" /> if the method has no return type.
trans-unit.target: 指定動態方法之傳回類型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件；如果方法沒有傳回類型，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects specifying the types of the parameters of the dynamic method, or <see langword="null" /> if the method has no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指定動態方法之參數類型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件陣列；如果方法沒有參數，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with which the dynamic method is logically associated.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法在邏輯方面相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method has access to all members of the type.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法可存取該類型的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to skip JIT visibility checks on types and members accessed by the MSIL of the dynamic method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要略過動態方法的 MSIL 所存取之類型和成員的 JIT 可見度檢查，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a dynamic method, specifying the method name, attributes, calling convention, return type, parameter types, the type with which the dynamic method is logically associated, and whether just-in-time (JIT) visibility checks should be skipped for types and members accessed by the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 建立動態方法、指定方法名稱、屬性、呼叫慣例、傳回類型、參數類型、動態方法在邏輯上相關聯的類型，以及是否應該略過動態方法的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 所存取之類型和成員的 Just-In-Time (JIT) 可見度檢查。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method is global to the module that contains the type `owner`.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法在全域範圍中包含的類型的模組`owner`。

trans-unit.source: It has access to all members of the type `owner`.
trans-unit.target: 存取類型的所有成員`owner`。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method created with this constructor has access to all members of the type `owner`, and to public and `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) members of all the types contained in the module that contains `owner`.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立此動態方法沒有型別的所有成員的存取權`owner`，和為 public 和`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) 包含的模組中所包含的所有型別的成員`owner`。

trans-unit.source: Skipping the JIT compiler's visibility checks allows the dynamic method to access private and protected members of all other types as well.
trans-unit.target: 略過 JIT 編譯器的可見性檢查可讓動態方法存取的所有其他型別的 private 和 protected 成員。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when writing code to serialize objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，撰寫程式碼來將物件序列化時，這十分有用。

trans-unit.source: For backward compatibility, this constructor demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag if the following conditions are both true: `owner` is in a module other than the calling module, and the demand for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag has failed.
trans-unit.target: 回溯相容性，這個建構函式要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，如果下列條件都為 true:`owner`以外呼叫模組，以及需求的模組中<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標失敗。

trans-unit.source: If the demand for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> succeeds, the operation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>成功時，允許此作業。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="parameterTypes" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="T:System.Void" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameterTypes" /> 的項目為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="owner" /> is an interface, an array, an open generic type, or a type parameter of a generic type or method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="owner" /> 是介面、陣列、開放式泛型類型，或者是泛型類型或方法的類型參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="owner" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="owner" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributes" /> is a combination of flags other than <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public" /> and <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributes" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static" /> 以外的旗標組合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="callingConvention" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callingConvention" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="returnType" /> is a type for which <see cref="P:System.Type.IsByRef" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="returnType" /> 類型是 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsByRef" /> 傳回 <see langword="true" /> 的對象。

trans-unit.source: to associate the dynamic method with a type in a module other than the calling module.
trans-unit.target: 若要動態方法關聯以外呼叫模組的模組中的型別。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes specified when the dynamic method was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得建立動態方法時所指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> values representing the attributes for the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> 值的位元組合，代表此方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the method attributes for a dynamic method are always <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public> and <xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static>.
trans-unit.target: 目前動態方法的方法屬性都<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Public>和<xref:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes.Static>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the method attributes of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示動態方法的方法屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the calling convention specified when the dynamic method was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得建立動態方法時所指定的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" /> values that indicates the calling convention of the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" /> 值的其中一個，表示該方法的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the calling convention for a dynamic method is always <xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard>.
trans-unit.target: 目前動態方法的呼叫慣例是一律<xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the calling convention of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示動態方法的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Completes the dynamic method and creates a delegate that can be used to execute it.
trans-unit.target: 完成動態方法，並建立可用來執行此動態方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: A delegate type whose signature matches that of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 一種委派類型，其簽章符合動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Completes the dynamic method and creates a delegate that can be used to execute it.
trans-unit.target: 完成動態方法，並建立可用來執行此動態方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of the specified type, which can be used to execute the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 指定類型的委派，可用於執行動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> method or the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method completes the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>方法或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法完成動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Any further attempt to alter the dynamic method, such as modifying parameter definitions or emitting more Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), is ignored; no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何進一步嘗試改變動態方法，例如修改參數定義或發出多個 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL)，則會忽略;擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To create a method body for a dynamic method when you have your own MSIL generator, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetDynamicILInfo%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立動態方法之方法主體，當您有自己的 MSIL 產生器時，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetDynamicILInfo%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have your own MSIL generator, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetILGenerator%2A> method to obtain an <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator> object that can be used to generate the method body.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有自己的 MSIL 產生器，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetILGenerator%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator>可以用來產生方法主體的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a dynamic method that takes two parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立動態方法採用兩個參數。

trans-unit.source: The example emits a simple function body that prints the first parameter to the console, and the example uses the second parameter as the return value of the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會發出列印至主控台時，第一個參數的簡單函式主體，此範例會使用做為方法的傳回值的第二個參數。

trans-unit.source: The example completes the method by creating a delegate, invokes the delegate with different parameters, and finally invokes the dynamic method using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例完成藉由建立委派的方法、 叫用使用不同的參數，委派和最後會叫用動態方法使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method has no method body.
trans-unit.target: 此動態方法沒有任何方法主體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> has the wrong number of parameters or the wrong parameter types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 的參數數目錯誤或參數類型錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A delegate type whose signature matches that of the dynamic method, minus the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一種委派類型，其簽章符合減去第一個參數的動態方法簽章。

trans-unit.source: An object the delegate is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 委派繫結至的物件。

trans-unit.source: Must be of the same type as the first parameter of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 必須是與動態方法的第一個參數相同類型。

trans-unit.source: Completes the dynamic method and creates a delegate that can be used to execute it, specifying the delegate type and an object the delegate is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 完成動態方法並建立可以用來執行它的委派，同時指定委派類型和委派繫結至的物件。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of the specified type, which can be used to execute the dynamic method with the specified target object.
trans-unit.target: 指定類型的委派，可用於對指定目標物件執行動態方法。

trans-unit.source: This method overload creates a delegate bound to a particular object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法多載建立委派繫結至特定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Such a delegate is said to be closed over its first argument.
trans-unit.target: 這類委派會在其第一個引數上關閉。

trans-unit.source: Although the method is static, it acts as if it were an instance method; the instance is `target`.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個方法是靜態的它可如同一般的執行個體方法。執行個體是`target`。

trans-unit.source: This method overload requires `target` to be of the same type as the first parameter of the dynamic method, or to be assignable to that type (for example, a derived class).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法多載都需要`target`是相同類型的第一個參數的動態方法，或要指派給該型別 （例如，在衍生類別）。

trans-unit.source: The signature of `delegateType` has all the parameters of the dynamic method except the first.
trans-unit.target: 簽章`delegateType`動態方法的第一個以外的所有參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the dynamic method has the parameters <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Int32>, and <xref:System.Byte>, then `delegateType` has the parameters <xref:System.Int32> and <xref:System.Byte>; `target` is of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此動態方法沒有參數<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Int32>，和<xref:System.Byte>，然後`delegateType`具有參數<xref:System.Int32>和<xref:System.Byte>;`target`的型別<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> method or the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method completes the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>方法或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法完成動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Any further attempt to alter the dynamic method, such as modifying parameter definitions or emitting more Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), is ignored; no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何進一步嘗試改變動態方法，例如修改參數定義或發出多個 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL)，則會忽略;擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To create a method body for a dynamic method when you have your own MSIL generator, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetDynamicILInfo%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立動態方法之方法主體，當您有自己的 MSIL 產生器時，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetDynamicILInfo%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have your own MSIL generator, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetILGenerator%2A> method to obtain an <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator> object that can be used to generate the method body.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有自己的 MSIL 產生器，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetILGenerator%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator>可以用來產生方法主體的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates delegate that binds a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> to an instance of a type, so that the method acts on the same instance each time it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立繫結的委派<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>型別的執行個體，使方法的運作將相同的執行個體上每次叫用它。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines a class named `Example` with a private field, a class named `DerivedFromxample` that derives from the first class, a delegate type named `UseLikeStatic` that returns <xref:System.Int32> and has parameters of type `Example` and <xref:System.Int32>, and a delegate type named `UseLikeInstance` that returns <xref:System.Int32> and has one parameter of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例定義名為類別`Example`私用欄位，與類別名稱為`DerivedFromxample`衍生自第一個類別，名為委派類型`UseLikeStatic`傳回<xref:System.Int32>且具有參數的型別`Example`和<xref:System.Int32>，和名為委派類型`UseLikeInstance`傳回<xref:System.Int32>且具有一個參數的型別<xref:System.Int32>。

trans-unit.source: The example code then creates a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> that changes the private field of an instance of `Example` and returns the previous value.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼接著會建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>變更執行個體的私用欄位`Example`並傳回先前的值。

trans-unit.source: In general, changing the internal fields of classes is not good object-oriented coding practice.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，變更類別的內部欄位不是良好的物件導向程式設計方式。

trans-unit.source: The example code creates an instance of `Example` and then creates two delegates.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼建立的執行個體`Example`，然後建立兩個委派。

trans-unit.source: The first is of type `UseLikeStatic`, which has the same parameters as the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 第一個是類型的`UseLikeStatic`，具有相同的動態方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The second is of type `UseLikeInstance`, which lacks the first parameter (of type `Example`).
trans-unit.target: 第二個是型別`UseLikeInstance`，缺少第一個參數 (型別`Example`)。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is created using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%29> method overload; the second parameter of that method overload is an instance of `Example`, in this case the instance just created, which is bound to the newly created delegate.
trans-unit.target: 這個委派會使用建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%29>方法多載; 第二個參數，該方法多載是的執行個體`Example`，在此情況下建立的執行個體只，為繫結到新建立的委派。

trans-unit.source: Whenever that delegate is invoked, the dynamic method acts on the bound instance of `Example`.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法時叫用委派時，處理程式碼的繫結的執行個體`Example`。

trans-unit.source: This is an example of the relaxed rules for delegate binding introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], along with new overloads of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這是比較不嚴謹的規則的範例，委派繫結中導入的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，以及新的多載<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Delegate> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Delegate> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The `UseLikeStatic` delegate is invoked, passing in the instance of `Example` that is bound to the `UseLikeInstance` delegate.
trans-unit.target: `UseLikeStatic`叫用委派，在執行個體中傳遞`Example`繫結至`UseLikeInstance`委派。

trans-unit.source: Then the `UseLikeInstance` delegate is invoked, so that both delegates act on the same instance of `Example`.
trans-unit.target: 然後在`UseLikeInstance`叫用委派，使這兩個相同的執行個體的代理人`Example`。

trans-unit.source: The changes in the values of the internal field are displayed after each call.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫之後，會顯示內部欄位的值中的變更。

trans-unit.source: Finally, a `UseLikeInstance` delegate is bound to an instance of `DerivedFromxample`, and the delegate calls are repeated.
trans-unit.target: 最後，`UseLikeInstance`委派繫結的執行個體`DerivedFromxample`，和委派呼叫，會重複。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method has no method body.
trans-unit.target: 此動態方法沒有任何方法主體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not the same type as the first parameter of the dynamic method, and is not assignable to that type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 與動態方法的第一個參數不是相同類型，且無法指派給該類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="delegateType" /> has the wrong number of parameters or the wrong parameter types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 的參數數目錯誤或參數類型錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that declares the method, which is always <see langword="null" /> for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 取得宣告方法的類型，如果是動態方法，則一律為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `null` for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`null`動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Even when a dynamic method is logically associated with a type, it is not declared by the type.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法在邏輯上相關的類型項目，即使它不是由宣告型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the declaring type of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示動態方法的宣告型別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: The position of the parameter in the parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 在參數清單中參數的位置。

trans-unit.source: Parameters are indexed beginning with the number 1 for the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 第一個參數的參數索引從數字 1 開始。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes" /> values that specifies the attributes of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定參數屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name can be a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可以是零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: Defines a parameter of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 定義動態方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If `position` is 0, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.DefineParameter%2A> method refers to the return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果`position`為 0，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.DefineParameter%2A>方法是指傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting parameter information has no effect on the return value.
trans-unit.target: 設定參數資訊有不會影響傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic method has already been completed, by calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.DefineParameter%2A> method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態方法已完成，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.DefineParameter%2A>方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不會有例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define parameter information for a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義的動態方法的參數資訊。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: The method has no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法沒有參數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="position" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="position" /> is greater than the number of the method's parameters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 大於方法參數的數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the base implementation for the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of the method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the current `DynamicMethod` object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回目前`DynamicMethod`物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes applied to the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回套用至方法的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search the method's inheritance chain to find the custom attributes; <see langword="false" /> to check only the current method.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示搜尋方法的繼承鏈結以尋找自訂屬性，<see langword="false" /> 表示只檢查目前的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes defined for the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回為這個方法定義的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects representing all the custom attributes of the method.
trans-unit.target: 代表這個方法所有自訂屬性的物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic methods, specifying `true` for `inherit` has no effect, because the method is not declared in a type.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法，指定`true`如`inherit`沒有任何作用，因為型別中未宣告為方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not currently supported on dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性目前不支援動態方法上。

trans-unit.source: The only attribute returned is <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute>; you can get the method implementation flags more easily using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的屬性會傳回為<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute>; 您可以取得該方法實作旗標更輕鬆地使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the type of custom attribute to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要傳回之自訂屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search the method's inheritance chain to find the custom attributes; <see langword="false" /> to check only the current method.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示搜尋方法的繼承鏈結以尋找自訂屬性，<see langword="false" /> 表示只檢查目前的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes of the specified type that have been applied to the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已套用至該方法之指定類型的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects representing the attributes of the method that are of type <paramref name="attributeType" /> or derive from type <paramref name="attributeType" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，表示型別為 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 或衍生自型別 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 之方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic methods, specifying `true` for `inherit` has no effect, because the method is not declared in a type.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法，指定`true`如`inherit`沒有任何作用，因為型別中未宣告為方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not currently supported on dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性目前不支援動態方法上。

trans-unit.source: The only attribute returned is <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute>; you can get the method implementation flags more easily using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的屬性會傳回為<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute>; 您可以取得該方法實作旗標更輕鬆地使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo" /> object that can be used to generate a method body from metadata tokens, scopes, and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) streams.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo" /> 物件，該物件可用於從中繼資料語彙基元 (Metadata Token)、範圍和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 資料流產生方法主體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo" /> object that can be used to generate a method body from metadata tokens, scopes, and MSIL streams.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo" /> 物件，可用於從中繼資料語彙基元、範圍和 MSIL 資料流產生方法主體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo> class is provided to support unmanaged code generation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo>類別提供來支援 unmanaged 程式碼產生。

trans-unit.source: to execute unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 執行 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an MSIL generator that can be used to emit a body for the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以用來發出動態方法之主體的 MSIL 產生器。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) generator for the method with a default MSIL stream size of 64 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 針對方法，傳回具有預設 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 資料流大小 64 位元組的 MSIL 產生器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> object for the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: After a dynamic method has been completed, by calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method, any further attempt to add MSIL is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 已完成動態方法，藉由呼叫之後<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法中，任何進一步嘗試加入 MSIL 會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不會有例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: There are restrictions on unverifiable code in dynamic methods, even in some full-trust scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 有一些限制在動態方法中，甚至在某些完全信任情況下無法驗證的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See the "Verification" section in Remarks for <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>.
trans-unit.target: 如需了解 <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>，請參閱＜備註＞中的＜驗證＞一節。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例會發出列印至主控台時，第一個參數的簡單函式主體，此範例會使用做為方法的傳回值的第二個參數。

trans-unit.source: The example completes the method by creating a delegate, invokes the delegate with different parameters, and finally invokes the dynamic method using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例完成藉由建立委派的方法、 叫用使用不同的參數，委派和最後會叫用動態方法使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The size of the MSIL stream, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> object for the method, with the specified MSIL stream size.
trans-unit.target: 方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> 物件，具有指定的 MSIL 資料流大小。

trans-unit.source: After a dynamic method has been completed, by calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method, any further attempt to add MSIL is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 已完成動態方法，藉由呼叫之後<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法中，任何進一步嘗試加入 MSIL 會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不會有例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: There are restrictions on unverifiable code in dynamic methods, even in some full-trust scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 有一些限制在動態方法中，甚至在某些完全信任情況下無法驗證的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See the "Verification" section in Remarks for <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the implementation flags for the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回方法的實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> values representing the implementation flags for the method.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the local variables in the method are zero-initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示在此方法中的區域變數是否以零起始。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the local variables in the method are zero-initialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此方法中的區域變數以零起始，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, the emitted Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) includes initialization of local variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，發出的 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL) 包含本機變數的初始化。

trans-unit.source: If it is set to `false`, local variables are not initialized and the generated code is unverifiable.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為`false`、 未初始化的區域變數和產生的程式碼，將無法驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.InitLocals%2A> property of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.InitLocals%2A>動態方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored for dynamic methods, because they are static.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個參數是靜態的，因此動態方法會予以忽略。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 請指定 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects through reflection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 物件，它透過反映啟用繫結、引數型別的強制型轉 (Coercion)、成員的引動過程，和 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的擷取。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: An argument list.
trans-unit.target: 引數清單。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of arguments with the same number, order, and type as the parameters of the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這是引數陣列，其數目、順序和類型與要叫用的方法參數相同。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters this parameter should be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數，則這個參數應該是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的執行個體，用於管理類型的強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是 <see langword="null" />，會使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, this information is needed to correctly convert a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 例如，必須有這個資訊，才能將表示 1000 的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 正確地轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，因為 1000 在不同文化特性中有不同的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the dynamic method using the specified parameters, under the constraints of the specified binder, with the specified culture information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文化特性資訊，在指定繫結器的條件約束下，以指定的參數叫用動態方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> containing the return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含叫用方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the listed exceptions, the calling code should be prepared to catch any exceptions thrown by the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 除了列出的例外狀況，呼叫程式碼應該準備好攔截動態方法所擲回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Executing a dynamic method with a delegate created by the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> method is more efficient than executing it with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 執行動態方法所建立的委派<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>方法會更有效率，比執行它與<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A> method or the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A> method completes the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Invoke%2A>方法或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%2A>方法完成動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Any further attempt to alter the dynamic method, such as modifying parameter definitions or emitting more Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), is ignored; no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何進一步嘗試改變動態方法，例如修改參數定義或發出多個 Microsoft 中繼語言 (MSIL)，則會忽略;擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: All dynamic methods are static, so the `obj` parameter is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所有的動態方法是靜態的所以`obj`參數會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To treat a dynamic method as if it were an instance method, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%29> overload that takes an object instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要將動態方法，就好像執行個體方法，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%29>接受物件執行個體的多載。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態方法沒有參數，值`parameters`應該`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 否則數字、 類型和參數陣列中項目的順序應該與數字、 類型和參數的動態方法的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is called by the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> method overload inherited from the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> class, so the preceding remarks apply to both overloads.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法多載會呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>方法多載繼承自<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>類別中，因此上述的 < 備註 > 一套用於兩個多載。

trans-unit.source: This method does not demand permissions directly, but invoking the dynamic method can result in security demands, depending on the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會直接要求權限，但叫用動態方法時，可能導致安全性要求，根據的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, no demands are made for anonymously hosted dynamic methods that are created with the `restrictedSkipVisibility` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，會提出任何要求的匿名裝載動態方法，以建立`restrictedSkipVisibility`參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if you create a method with `restrictedSkipVisibility` set to `true` so it can access a hidden member of a target assembly, the method will cause a demand for the permissions of the target assembly plus <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果您建立的方法與`restrictedSkipVisibility`設`true`讓它可存取的目標組件的隱藏的成員，方法會導致目標組件加上的權限的要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: Prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method required <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess> flag.
trans-unit.target: 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法所需<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following code example invokes a dynamic method with exact binding, using the US-English culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例中，會叫用動態方法與完全繫結，使用英文 （美國） 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.VarArgs" /> calling convention is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.VarArgs" /> 呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in <paramref name="parameters" /> does not match the number of parameters in the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 中的項目數不符合動態方法中的參數數目。

trans-unit.source: The type of one or more elements of <paramref name="parameters" /> does not match the type of the corresponding parameter of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 之一個或多個項目的型別不符合動態方法的對應參數型別。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method is associated with a module, is not anonymously hosted, and was constructed with <paramref name="skipVisibility" /> set to <see langword="false" />, but the dynamic method accesses members that are not <see langword="public" /> or <see langword="internal" /> (<see langword="Friend" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 動態方法是與模組相關聯，不是匿名裝載，而且建構時 <paramref name="skipVisibility" /> 設為 <see langword="false" />，但是動態方法會存取不是 <see langword="public" /> 或 <see langword="internal" /> (Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Friend" />) 的成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The dynamic method is anonymously hosted and was constructed with <paramref name="skipVisibility" /> set to <see langword="false" />, but it accesses members that are not <see langword="public" />.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法是匿名裝載，且建構時 <paramref name="skipVisibility" /> 設為 <see langword="false" />，但是它會存取不是 <see langword="public" /> 的成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The dynamic method contains unverifiable code.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法含有未經驗證的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See the "Verification" section in Remarks for <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需了解 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod" />，請參閱＜備註＞中的＜驗證＞一節。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the type of custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要搜尋之自訂屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search the method's inheritance chain to find the custom attributes; <see langword="false" /> to check only the current method.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示搜尋方法的繼承鏈結以尋找自訂屬性，<see langword="false" /> 表示只檢查目前的方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified custom attribute type is defined.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否已定義指定的自訂屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified custom attribute type is defined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的自訂屬性型別已定義，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic methods, specifying `true` for `inherit` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法，指定`true`如`inherit`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic methods have no inheritance chain.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法可以有任何的繼承鏈結。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not currently supported on dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性目前不支援動態方法上。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current dynamic method is security-critical or security-safe-critical, and therefore can perform critical operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示目前動態方法是否為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，因而可以執行重要的作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current dynamic method is security-critical or security-safe-critical; <see langword="false" /> if it is transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前動態方法為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果它是透明，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> properties report the transparency level of the dynamic method as determined by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityCritical%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>屬性報告 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：

trans-unit.source: Security level
trans-unit.target: 安全性層級

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecuritySafeCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecuritySafeCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityTransparent
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityTransparent

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Safe critical
trans-unit.target: 安全關鍵

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。

trans-unit.source: The transparency of a dynamic method depends on the module it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法的透明度，取決於其相關聯的模組。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic method is associated with a type rather than a module, its transparency depends on the module that contains the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態方法的型別，而不是模組與相關聯，其透明度相依於此模組包含的型別。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic methods do not have security annotations, so they are assigned the default transparency for the associated module.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法沒有安全性註釋，因此就會指派預設的透明度相關聯的模組。

trans-unit.source: Anonymously hosted dynamic methods are always transparent, because the system-provided module that contains them is transparent.
trans-unit.target: 匿名裝載動態方法永遠是透明的因為它們包含的系統提供模組而言是透明。

trans-unit.source: The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述與受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取） 相關聯的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: Assembly annotation
trans-unit.target: 組件註解

trans-unit.source: Level 1 transparency
trans-unit.target: 層級 1 透明度

trans-unit.source: Level 2 transparency
trans-unit.target: 層級 2 透明度

trans-unit.source: Fully transparent
trans-unit.target: 完全透明

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Fully critical
trans-unit.target: 完全重大

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Mixed transparency
trans-unit.target: 混合的透明度

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Security-agnostic
trans-unit.target: 無從驗證的安全性

trans-unit.source: Safe-critical
trans-unit.target: 安全關鍵

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: For example, if you associate a dynamic method with a type that is in mscorlib.dll, which has level 2 mixed transparency, the dynamic method is transparent and cannot execute critical code.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將動態方法關聯 mscorlib.dll 中，有層級 2 混合的透明度，其中的型別動態方法是透明的並無法執行重要的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For information about transparency levels, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md) and [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).
trans-unit.target: 透明度層級的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)和[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。

trans-unit.source: Associating a dynamic method with a module in a trusted level 1 assembly that is security-agnostic, such as System.dll, does not permit elevation of trust.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法關聯中與安全性無關，（例如 system.dll），是信任層級 1 組件的模組不允許提高權限的信任。

trans-unit.source: If the grant set of the code that calls the dynamic method does not include the grant set of System.dll (that is, full trust), <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the dynamic method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的動態方法的程式碼的授權集不包含 System.dll （也就是完全信任） 的授權集<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>動態方法呼叫時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a partially trusted assembly depends on how the assembly is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 載入組件的方式取決於部分信任組件相關聯的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly is loaded with partial trust (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件已載入以部分信任 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。

trans-unit.source: The assembly and all its types and members, including dynamic methods, are treated as transparent.
trans-unit.target: 組件和所有類型和成員，包括動態方法，會都視為透明的。

trans-unit.source: The runtime pays attention to security annotations only if the partial-trust assembly is loaded with full trust (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application).
trans-unit.target: 只有部分信任組件是以完全信任 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域） 來載入執行階段會付款注意安全性註釋。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the runtime assigns the dynamic method the default transparency for methods according to the assembly's annotations.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，執行階段指派的動態方法預設透明度根據組件的註解的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).
trans-unit.target: 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method doesn't have a method body.
trans-unit.target: 此動態方法沒有方法主體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current dynamic method is security-safe-critical at the current trust level; that is, whether it can perform critical operations and can be accessed by transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示目前動態方法在目前信任層級上是否為安全性安全關鍵，也就是說，它是否能執行重要作業並由安全性透明的程式碼存取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dynamic method is security-safe-critical at the current trust level; <see langword="false" /> if it is security-critical or transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態方法在目前信任層級上為安全性安全關鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果它是安全性關鍵或透明，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> properties report the transparency level of the dynamic method as determined by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityCritical%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>屬性報告 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：

trans-unit.source: Security level
trans-unit.target: 安全性層級

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecuritySafeCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecuritySafeCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityTransparent
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityTransparent

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Safe critical
trans-unit.target: 安全關鍵

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。

trans-unit.source: The transparency of a dynamic method depends on the module it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法的透明度，取決於其相關聯的模組。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic method is associated with a type rather than a module, its transparency depends on the module that contains the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態方法的型別，而不是模組與相關聯，其透明度相依於此模組包含的型別。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic methods do not have security annotations, so they are assigned the default transparency for the associated module.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法沒有安全性註釋，因此就會指派預設的透明度相關聯的模組。

trans-unit.source: Anonymously hosted dynamic methods are always transparent, because the system-provided module that contains them is transparent.
trans-unit.target: 匿名裝載動態方法永遠是透明的因為它們包含的系統提供模組而言是透明。

trans-unit.source: The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述與受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取） 相關聯的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: Assembly annotation
trans-unit.target: 組件註解

trans-unit.source: Level 1 transparency
trans-unit.target: 層級 1 透明度

trans-unit.source: Level 2 transparency
trans-unit.target: 層級 2 透明度

trans-unit.source: Fully transparent
trans-unit.target: 完全透明

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Fully critical
trans-unit.target: 完全重大

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Mixed transparency
trans-unit.target: 混合的透明度

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Security-agnostic
trans-unit.target: 無從驗證的安全性

trans-unit.source: Safe-critical
trans-unit.target: 安全關鍵

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: For example, if you associate a dynamic method with a type that is in mscorlib.dll, which has level 2 mixed transparency, the dynamic method is transparent and cannot execute critical code.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將動態方法關聯 mscorlib.dll 中，有層級 2 混合的透明度，其中的型別動態方法是透明的並無法執行重要的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For information about transparency levels, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md) and [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).
trans-unit.target: 透明度層級的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)和[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。

trans-unit.source: Associating a dynamic method with a module in a trusted level 1 assembly that is security-agnostic, such as System.dll, does not permit elevation of trust.
trans-unit.target: 動態方法關聯中與安全性無關，（例如 system.dll），是信任層級 1 組件的模組不允許提高權限的信任。

trans-unit.source: If the grant set of the code that calls the dynamic method does not include the grant set of System.dll (that is, full trust), <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the dynamic method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的動態方法的程式碼的授權集不包含 System.dll （也就是完全信任） 的授權集<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>動態方法呼叫時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The transparency of a dynamic method that is associated with a partially trusted assembly depends on how the assembly is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 載入組件的方式取決於部分信任組件相關聯的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly is loaded with partial trust (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件已載入以部分信任 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。

trans-unit.source: The assembly and all its types and members, including dynamic methods, are treated as transparent.
trans-unit.target: 組件和所有類型和成員，包括動態方法，會都視為透明的。

trans-unit.source: The runtime pays attention to security annotations only if the partial-trust assembly is loaded with full trust (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application).
trans-unit.target: 只有部分信任組件是以完全信任 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域） 來載入執行階段會付款注意安全性註釋。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the runtime assigns the dynamic method the default transparency for methods according to the assembly's annotations.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，執行階段指派的動態方法預設透明度根據組件的註解的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).
trans-unit.target: 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method doesn't have a method body.
trans-unit.target: 此動態方法沒有方法主體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current dynamic method is transparent at the current trust level, and therefore cannot perform critical operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示目前動態方法在目前信任層級上是否為安全性透明，因此無法執行重要作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dynamic method is security-transparent at the current trust level; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態方法在目前信任層級上為安全性透明，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> properties report the transparency level of the dynamic method as determined by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityCritical%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>屬性報告 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的動態方法的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：

trans-unit.target: 安全性層級

trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecuritySafeCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecuritySafeCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityTransparent
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityTransparent

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: Critical

trans-unit.source: Safe critical
trans-unit.target: 安全關鍵

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic method doesn't have a method body.
trans-unit.target: 此動態方法沒有方法主體。

trans-unit.source: Not supported for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 不支援動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Not supported for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 不支援動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Not allowed for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 不允許動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the module with which the dynamic method is logically associated.
trans-unit.target: 取得動態方法在邏輯上相關聯的模組。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> with which the current dynamic method is associated.
trans-unit.target: 目前的動態方法與其相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" />。

trans-unit.source: If a module was specified when the dynamic method was created, this property returns that module.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了模組建立動態方法時，這個屬性會傳回該模組。

trans-unit.source: If a type was specified as the owner when the dynamic method was created, this property returns the module which contains that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果建立動態方法時，已指定為擁有者的類型，這個屬性會傳回包含該類型的模組。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Module%2A> property of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.Module%2A>動態方法的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 取得動態方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的簡單名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to name dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要動態方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the name of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示動態方法的名稱。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class that was used in reflection to obtain the method.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於反映中以取得方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `null` for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`null`動態方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the reflected type of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示動態方法的反映型別。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the return parameter of the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 取得動態方法的傳回參數。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `null` for dynamic methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`null`動態方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of return value for the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 取得此動態方法傳回值的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the type of the return value of the current method; <see cref="T:System.Void" /> if the method has no return type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 代表目前方法之傳回值的類型；如果此方法沒有傳回類型，則為 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: If `null` was specified for the return type when the dynamic method was created, this property returns <xref:System.Void?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`null`時建立動態方法，這個屬性會傳回所指定的傳回型別的<xref:System.Void?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the return type of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示動態方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom attributes of the return type for the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 取得動態方法之傳回型別的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" /> representing the custom attributes of the return type for the dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" />，表示動態方法之傳回型別的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not supported on the return type of a dynamic method, so the array of custom attributes returned by the <xref:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method is always empty.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性不支援之傳回類型的動態方法，因此所傳回的自訂屬性陣列<xref:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法永遠為空白。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to display the custom attributes of the return type of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示之自訂屬性的動態方法的傳回型別。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the signature of the method, represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回方法的簽章，以字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 表示方法簽章的字串。

trans-unit.source: The signature includes only types and the method name, if any.
trans-unit.target: 簽章僅包含類型和方法名稱，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Parameter names are not included.
trans-unit.target: 不包含參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.ToString%2A> method of a dynamic method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod.ToString%2A>動態方法的方法。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>類別。
